```{r}
library(conflicted)
library(devtools)
library(DiagrammeR)
library(here)
library(knitr)
library(magrittr)
library(pedtools)
library(roxygen2)
library(tidyverse)
library(visNetwork)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  collapse = TRUE,
  message  = FALSE,
  warning  = FALSE,
  echo     = TRUE,
  include  = TRUE,
  eval     = TRUE,
  comment  = ""
)
conflicts_prefer(lubridate::interval)
conflicts_prefer(dplyr::filter)
conflicts_prefer(purrr::set_names)
studbook <- read_csv(here("inst/extdata/studbook.csv"))
pedigree <- build_ped_series(studbook) %>% 
  extract_pedigree("_comp1", "Contemporary")
```

```{r}
edges_vis <- ped_visEdges(studbook, pedigree)
nodes_vis <- ped_visNodes(studbook, pedigree)
nodes_female_deceased <- visGroups(groupname = "female_deceased", color = "#D5328833", shape = "circle")
nodes_male_deceased   <- visGroups(groupname = "female_deceased", color = "#D5328833", shape = "circle")

network <- visNetwork(nodes_vis, edges_vis, width = "100%")
```

```{r}
edge_connectors   <- edges_connectors(
    studbook = studbook,
    pedigree = pedigree
  )
```


```{r}
  studbook_connectors <- studbook_nodes(
    studbook = studbook,
    pedigree = pedigree
  ) %>%
    mutate(offspring= as.integer(label),
           .keep = "unused") %>%
    select(
      offspring,
      group     = edge_group,
      tooltip   = tooltip_connector
    ) %>%
  left_join(paths, )

```


```{r}
key_connectors   <- edges_connectors(
    studbook = studbook,
    pedigree = pedigree
  )  %>%
    select(parents   = from,
           offspring = to,
           color     = edge_color,
           group,
           tooltip) %>%
    pivot_longer(c(parents, offspring),
                 names_to  = "type",
                 values_to = "node") %>%
    distinct(node, color, group, tooltip) %>%
    arrange(node)
```
